com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics.Color
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Color>

    public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Color>
    A simple wrapper round the values required for a color
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
